```{r}
manhattan <- parse_ranking("A ~ D ~ E > G > C > B ~ H > F")
euclidean <- parse_ranking("E > C ~ G > A ~ D > B > F ~ H")
chebyshev <- parse_ranking("C ~ E > B > F > G > A ~ D ~ H")
```

```{r}
por <- profile_of_rankings(rbind(manhattan, euclidean, chebyshev))
```

```{r}
plurality(por)
```
